top_items.author: @rileybrown

title.en-US: OpenClaw accessing Blender, Cinema 4D, After Effects, Figma
title.zh-CN: 展示OpenClaw接入Blender、C4D、AE、Figma等创意工具后的强大能力。

summary.en-US: OpenClaw创意工具集成、Agent能力边界扩展
summary.zh-CN: 超高互动(634赞)展示OpenClaw在创意生产管道的实际应用，完美体现"表/里世界"框架——创意工具正从App退化为Agent可调用的能力。

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw创意工具集成、Agent能力边界扩展
top_items.suggested_angle: The surface world of creative software is becoming infrastructure for the inner world. When agents can orchestrate Blender, Cinema 4D, and Figma in a single workflow, the tool fades and intent takes over. This is the migration from GUI to agent-native computing.

js_take.en-US: This is the shift from GUI-native to agent-native. Creative tools becoming APIs that agents orchestrate. The interface fades when intent becomes the interface.
js_take.zh-CN: This is the shift from GUI-native to agent-native. Creative tools becoming APIs that agents orchestrate. The interface fades when intent becomes the interface.

top_items.author: @levelsio

title.en-US: Chat with sites via Telegram using OpenClaw, scared to run on production
title.zh-CN: Levelsio分享通过Telegram直接与网站对话构建功能，承认一直害怕在生产服务器上运行OpenClaw。

summary.en-US: OpenClaw生产部署、安全风险、Agent应用
summary.zh-CN: 超高互动(929赞)来自知名独立开发者，展示OpenClaw生产环境的真实顾虑，可从"不造奇观，建系统"回应——安全是系统的一部分，不是障碍。

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw生产部署、安全风险、Agent应用
top_items.suggested_angle: Production fear is rational. When agents have write access to real systems, the blast radius is real. But that's not a reason to avoid adoption—it's a reason to build guardrails. Safety is part of the system, not a blocker.

js_take.en-US: Rational fear. When agents have write access, blast radius is real. But the answer isn't avoidance—it's building guardrails. Safety is system design, not a blocker.
js_take.zh-CN: Rational fear. When agents have write access, blast radius is real. But the answer isn't avoidance—it's building guardrails. Safety is system design, not a blocker.

top_items.author: @johann_sath

summary.en-US: OpenClaw系统化、工作空间组织、架构演进
summary.zh-CN: OpenClaw系统化建设、工作空间组织架构演进

top_items.relevance: OpenClaw系统化、工作空间组织、架构演进
top_items.suggested_angle: Structure as intelligence. When files become a system, chaos becomes capability.

js_take.en-US: The leap from chatbot to system isn't just about files—it's about architecture. Most people stop at the toy stage because they never realize the workspace *is* the product. Structure isn't organization; it's intelligence.
js_take.zh-CN: 从聊天机器人到系统的跨越，不只是文件的问题——而是架构的问题。大多数人停在玩具阶段，因为他们从没意识到工作空间*就是*产品。结构不是整理，而是智能。
